text: Human umbilical artery endothelial cells (HUAECs) are cells derived from the endothelium of arteries from the umbilical cord. They are used as a laboratory model system for the study of the function and pathology of endothelial cells (e.g., atherosclerosis). HUAECs have “cobblestone” morphology. == References == == External links == * Human Umbilical Artery Endothelial Cells(HUVEC) Catalog #8010 at ScienCell Research Laboratories, inc. Category:Cell culture
title: Human umbilical artery endothelial cells
